trans-unit.source: Access the Notifications View

seg-source.mrk: Access the Notifications View

target.mrk: Accéder à la vue Notifications

trans-unit.source: Notifications are based on a range of settings and provide recommendations for optimizing your server's operation. Items are checked based on the configuration level of your server. The configuration level represents a combination of the number of cores in your CPU, the RAM, and the size of the SSD.

seg-source.mrk: Notifications are based on a range of settings and provide recommendations for optimizing your server's operation.
Items are checked based on the configuration level of your server.
The configuration level represents a combination of the number of cores in your CPU, the RAM, and the size of the SSD.

target.mrk: Les notifications portent sur une série de paramètres et proposent des recommandations pour optimiser le fonctionnement de votre serveur.
Les éléments sont vérifiés en fonction du niveau de configuration de votre serveur.
Le niveau de configuration représente une combinaison du nombre de cœurs dans votre CPU, de la RAM et de la taille du SSD.

trans-unit.source: Checks are carried out when <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> starts up, and then every 24 hours thereafter at 00:00.

seg-source.mrk: Checks are carried out when <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> starts up, and then every 24 hours thereafter at 00:00.

target.mrk: Les vérifications sont réalisées au démarrage de l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, puis toutes les 24 heures à 00:00.

trans-unit.source: Open the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> <MadCap:variable name="ALN.adm_exe" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

seg-source.mrk: Open the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> <MadCap:variable name="ALN.adm_exe" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: Ouvrez la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.adm_exe" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: Select Notifications.

seg-source.mrk: Select Notifications.

target.mrk: Sélectionnez Notifications.

trans-unit.source: In the list of notifications, you can:

seg-source.mrk: In the list of notifications, you can:

target.mrk: Dans la liste des notifications, vous pouvez :

trans-unit.source: Set a severity threshold for each type of notification, using the cogwheel button.

seg-source.mrk: Set a severity threshold for each type of notification, using the cogwheel button.

target.mrk: Définir un seuil de sévérité pour chaque type de notification, à l'aide du bouton en forme de roue dentée.

trans-unit.source: Set a frequency and recipients for e-mail notifications, using the cogwheel button. To add new versions and main corrections to the items affected by the verifications, you can activate Accept to receive notifications of releases and important patches.

seg-source.mrk: Set a frequency and recipients for e-mail notifications, using the cogwheel button.
To add new versions and main corrections to the items affected by the verifications, you can activate Accept to receive notifications of releases and important patches.

target.mrk: Définir une fréquence et des destinataires pour les notifications par e-mail, à l'aide du bouton en forme de roue dentée.

Pour ajouter de nouvelles versions et des corrections principales aux éléments concernés par les vérifications, vous pouvez activer Accepter de recevoir des notifications de versions et de correctifs importants.

trans-unit.source: Filter per type of notification. Two types of notifications exist : active notifications require an action from a user whereas acknowledged notifications do not require an action from a user.

seg-source.mrk: Filter per type of notification.
Two types of notifications exist : active notifications require an action from a user whereas acknowledged notifications do not require an action from a user.

target.mrk: Filtrer par type de notification.

Deux types de notifications existent : les notifications actives nécessitent une action de la part d'un utilisateur alors que les notifications acquittées ne nécessitent pas d'action de la part d'un utilisateur.

trans-unit.source: Filter per severity (information, error, warning).

seg-source.mrk: Filter per severity (information, error, warning).

target.mrk: Filtrer par sévérité (informations, erreur, avertissement).

trans-unit.source: Refresh the list of notifications.

seg-source.mrk: Refresh the list of notifications.

target.mrk: Actualiser la liste des notifications.

trans-unit.source: Export the list of notifications in CSV or HTML formats.

seg-source.mrk: Export the list of notifications in CSV or HTML formats.

target.mrk: Exporter la liste des notifications au format CSV ou HTML.

trans-unit.source: Consult resolution tips besides the notification severity.

seg-source.mrk: Consult resolution tips besides the notification severity.

target.mrk: Consulter les solutions de résolution en plus de la sévérité de la notification.

trans-unit.source: The interface contains the following columns (<MadCap:xref href="#Notification_parameters" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>):

seg-source.mrk: The interface contains the following columns (<MadCap:xref href="#Notification_parameters" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>):

target.mrk: L'interface contient les colonnes suivantes (<MadCap:xref href="#Notification_parameters" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>) :

trans-unit.source: Notification parameters

seg-source.mrk: Notification parameters

target.mrk: Paramètres de notification

target.mrk: Paramètres

target.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Resolution tip

seg-source.mrk: Resolution tip

target.mrk: Conseil de résolution

trans-unit.source: Allows you to click the and provide a possible solution to the message displayed in the interface.

seg-source.mrk: Allows you to click the and provide a possible solution to the message displayed in the interface.

target.mrk: Permet de cliquer sur et de fournir une solution possible au message affiché dans l'interface.

trans-unit.source: Severity

seg-source.mrk: Severity

target.mrk: Sévérité

trans-unit.source: Specifies each message as Information, Warning, or Error.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies each message as Information, Warning, or Error.

target.mrk: Spécifie chaque message comme étant un(e) Information, Avertissement ou Erreur.

trans-unit.source: Message

seg-source.mrk: Message

target.mrk: Message

trans-unit.source: Identifies the name and result of the item on which the checking is performed (e.g. size of RAM, database etc.).

seg-source.mrk: Identifies the name and result of the item on which the checking is performed (e.g. size of RAM, database etc.).

target.mrk: Identifie le nom et le résultat de l'élément sur lequel la vérification est effectuée (par exemple, taille de la RAM, de la base de données, etc.).

trans-unit.source: Acknowledge date

seg-source.mrk: Acknowledge date

target.mrk: Date d'acquittement des notifications

trans-unit.source: Filters the notifications that you have acknowledged per date.

seg-source.mrk: Filters the notifications that you have acknowledged per date.

target.mrk: Filtre les notifications que vous avez acquittées par date.

trans-unit.source: Node (multi-server configuration only)

seg-source.mrk: Node (multi-server configuration only)

target.mrk: Nœud (configuration multi-serveur uniquement)

trans-unit.source: Identifies the node from which a notification emanates. This parameter is available in a multi-server configuration only.

seg-source.mrk: Identifies the node from which a notification emanates.
This parameter is available in a multi-server configuration only.

target.mrk: Identifie le nœud d'où émane une notification.
Ce paramètre n'est disponible que dans une configuration multi-serveur.

trans-unit.source: You can configure an alarm notification so that the checks tool sends an e-mail when the server returns an alarm. See <MadCap:xref href="Configure_SMTP_Mail_Service.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Configuring the SMTP Mail Service</MadCap:xref> for more details.

seg-source.mrk: You can configure an alarm notification so that the checks tool sends an e-mail when the server returns an alarm.
See <MadCap:xref href="Configure_SMTP_Mail_Service.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Configuring the SMTP Mail Service</MadCap:xref> for more details.

target.mrk: Vous pouvez configurer une notification d'alarme afin que l'outil de vérification envoie un e-mail lorsque le serveur retourne une alarme.
Voir <MadCap:xref href="Configure_SMTP_Mail_Service.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Configuring the SMTP Mail Service</MadCap:xref> pour plus de détails.
